description: Dinner's done in 15 minutes with this simple salad pairing rump steak, vermicelli noodles and a Woolworths kaleslaw kit. Dig in.
name: Easy Beef Salad With Chilli Mayonnaise Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.3333 cup Praise Goodness chilli whole-egg mayonnaise

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large frying pan over medium heat. Add oil. Season steaks. Add steaks to pan and cook for 3 minutes each side, for medium, or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm.
Meanwhile, add noodles to a large bowl and cover with boiling water. Stand for 5 minutes. Drain and rinse with cold water.
In a large bowl, toss together kaleslaw kit contents and noodles.
Slice steaks and serve with noodle salad. Top with mayonnaise
